mapper.select: SELECT GUGUN_CODE, GUGUN_NAME FROM GUGUN_CODE ORDER BY GUGUN_NAME ASC
SELECT DONG_CODE, DONG_NAME, GUGUN_CODE FROM DONG_CODE WHERE GUGUN_CODE = #{gugunCode} ORDER BY DONG_NAME ASC

select house_deal.no, gugun_code.gugun_name, house_deal.dong_name, house_deal.house_name, house_deal.deal_amount, house_deal.area, house_deal.deal_year, house_deal.deal_month, house_deal.deal_day, house_info.lat, house_info.lng from house_deal, dong_code, house_info, gugun_code where house_deal.dong_name = dong_code.dong_name and house_info.dong_name = dong_code.dong_name and house_info.house_name = house_deal.house_name and dong_code.dong_code = #{houseSearchWord} and gugun_code.gugun_code = house_deal.gugun_code ORDER BY house_deal.NO LIMIT #{houseLimit} OFFSET #{houseOffset}

SELECT house_deal.no, gugun_code.gugun_name, house_deal.dong_name, house_deal.house_name, house_deal.deal_amount, house_deal.area, house_deal.deal_year, house_deal.deal_month, house_deal.deal_day, house_info.lat, house_info.lng FROM house_deal, house_info, gugun_code WHERE house_deal.house_name = house_info.house_name AND house_deal.dong_name = house_info.dong_name AND house_deal.house_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{houseSearchWord},'%') AND gugun_code.gugun_code = house_deal.gugun_code ORDER BY HOUSE_DEAL.NO
